property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then look at one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your light creatures and darkness creatures can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your water creatures and fire creatures in the battle zone has "slayer." (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Whenever this creature blocks, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have "silent skill" are put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Whenever one of your creatures that has "silent skill" would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature can't be blocked. {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a fire creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose a race. Each creature of that race gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)
